item.title: Part-Time Content and Marketing Assistant - Upwork
item.description:
Role Overview:

We are seeking a highly organized, detail-oriented, and proactive Content and Marketing Assistant to join our team as an independent contractor. This part-time role is crucial for maintaining our online presence, ensuring high-quality content delivery, and optimizing our outreach efforts. The ideal candidate will be adept at managing multiple tasks, communicating effectively, and working independently with minimal supervision.

Responsibilities:

Daily Review: Monitor Slack, Asana, and email notifications to stay updated on tasks and communications.
Podcast Management: Schedule new podcast episodes on Libsyn, create podcast artwork using ChatGPT and Canva, and submit transcripts to Rev.com.
Content Coordination: Provide new podcast transcripts to our content writer weekly.
Video and Social Media Management: Schedule YouTube long videos and shorts, generate descriptions using Descript, optimize SEO, and engage with comments to boost engagement.
Social Media Posting: Schedule and audit posts on Facebook, Gettr, TruthSocial, LinkedIn, and Clapper to ensure they are appropriate and effective.
Email Campaigns: Schedule emails in Active Campaign and Get Response, review content for spelling and grammatical errors, ensure proper linking, and maintain high standards of communication.
Content Auditing: Review all content before posting to ensure quality and appropriateness.
Prompt Communication: Maintain prompt and effective communication with the team.

Qualifications:

Proficiency in Slack, Asana, Google Suites (Gmail, Calendar, etc.), and other project management tools.
Experience with social media platforms, including YouTube, Facebook, Gettr, TruthSocial, LinkedIn, and Clapper.
Familiarity with podcast platforms (Libsyn), content creation tools (Canva, ChatGPT), and transcription services (Rev.com).
At least 2 years of experience with Active Campaign and Get Response.
Strong interpersonal, verbal, and written communication skills in English.
Basic understanding of SEO and engagement strategies.
Strong attention to detail and excellent communication skills.
Ability to work independently, prioritize tasks, and meet deadlines without direct supervision.
Previous experience in a similar role is preferred.
Self-starter, comfortable working 100% remotely.

Requirements:

Reliable internet connection and a dedicated workspace.
Availability for bi-weekly meetings and daily task reviews.
Commitment to maintaining high standards in all tasks and communications.
Flexibility to adapt and take on additional responsibilities as needed.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 18, 2024 23:55 UTC
Category: General Virtual Assistance
Skills:Social Media Management, YouTube SEO, Podcast Editing, YouTube Marketing, Email Management
Skills: Social Media Management, YouTube SEO, Podcast Editing, YouTube Marketing, Email Management
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Interview Highlights - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented video editor to cut 45-minute interviews and transform them into captivating and concise 3-8 minute videos in a 16:9 aspect ratio. Additionally, you will be tasked with creating 3 separate 30-second social highlight videos in a 9:16 aspect ratio. Your task will be to edit the videos, apply basic colour correction and add subtitles and then send back a Davinci Resolve or Adobe Premier Pro file.

The videos are educational interviews filming of lived experience survivors of domestic violence or experts in LGBTQ+ domestic and family violence prevention. Our goal is to turn each interview into short engaging content like https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5Rk1ArxetMU

We will provide notes and annotations for each interview, as well as any music you'd like to include for smoothing transitions or edits.

Original videos are recorded in 6K open gate on a Lumix s5iiX. Raw footage+proxies can be uploaded to Dropbox or a shared file system of your choice.

Attention to detail is important and you must be able to carefully select the most impactful moments from each interview and seamlessly weave them together to create a cohesive and captivating video. Additionally, you should possess a strong sense of timing and be able to effectively utilize transitions, effects, and other editing tools to enhance the overall quality of the videos.

Working within tight deadlines is a common occurrence in this role. Therefore, the ability to manage your time effectively and prioritize tasks is crucial. You should be able to work efficiently without compromising the quality of your work.

If you have a portfolio or examples of similar projects that you have worked on, we highly encourage you to include them in your application. This will give us a better understanding of your skills and capabilities as a video editor.

Hourly Range: $15.00-$36.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 00:03 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:DaVinci Resolve, Color Grading, Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Skills: DaVinci Resolve, Color Grading, Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Podcast Video & Audio Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are a rapidly-growing podcast agency dedicated to enhancing the audio and visual experience of our diverse clientele. As we continue to expand, we are searching for a dedicated and dynamic part-time Podcast Video & Audio Editor to join our team.

Key Responsibilities:

- Editing Expertise: Edit podcast video and audio to the highest standard, ensuring clarity, engagement, and professional polish.

- Social Media Savvy: Must be familiar with the "engaging editing style", using engaging captions and b-rolls. Knowledge in extracting and editing engaging clips for social media, understanding how to use hooks, and basic marketing skills are a plus.

- Story Telling: Craft a cohesive and engaging narrative using b-roll and other materials.

- Collaboration: Work closely with other team members, providing insights and feedback to improve the overall content quality.

- Timeliness: Consistently meet deadlines and maintain punctuality. Being on time and reliable is paramount to this role.

--

Requirements:

Proficient in audio/video editing.
Familiarity with iZotope RX is a plus.
Must be experienced with the latest version of Adobe Premiere.
A portfolio containing samples related to podcasting, showcasing both video/audio podcasts and social media clips.
A genuine passion for learning and growing within the industry.

*This can lead to full-time position. We can also offer a fix price.



Hourly Range: $15.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 00:01 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Media Video, Adobe Premiere Pro, Audio Editing, Podcast, Audio Post Production, Video Editing, Video Editing & Production
Skills: Social Media Video, Adobe Premiere Pro, Audio Editing, Podcast, Audio Post Production, Video Editing, Video Editing & Production
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for personal + product brands - Upwork
item.description:
Hi,

I have multiple projects going on right now that require editing.

I manage two startup brands in the CPG space that will require occasional editing services for reels and ads.

In addition to this, I am also looking to increase my own personal online presence as a marketing and brand development professional.

I would love to talk with some people who have experience in this field.

Initially, it will be a price per project or hourly basis but as things get busier this will eventually turn into potential full-time employment.

I love to take content but I absolutely hate editing. The ideal work flow would be for me to upload weekly, clips and videos that we can work together to come up with strategies. I want the person who fills this role to understand what is currently trending in audio and visual styles.

As the relationship grows, the pay has the opportunity to increase. I set the budget as a placeholder. I am looking for someone with strong skills.

Please respond with some examples of your editing style. I will be setting up interviews with those that fit my aesthetic and we can discuss work flow.

Open to any locations.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 18, 2024 23:58 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Audio Editing, Compositing, Dynamic Transition, Video Editing, Videography, Video Post-Editing, Graphic Design, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Audio Editing, Compositing, Dynamic Transition, Video Editing, Videography, Video Post-Editing, Graphic Design, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: OBS & ZOOM (Overlays, Presenters, Comments, Emojis) - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled OBS and ZOOM expert to assist us in creating captivating visual effects for our online events. The ideal candidate will have a solid understanding of OBS and ZOOM platforms and be able to implement effects such as showcasing participants, displaying text on screen from participants, and other engaging visual enhancements. This position requires a creative mindset and a keen eye for detail. If you have experience in designing and executing impressive visual effects using OBS and ZOOM, we would love to hear from you. Join our team and help us elevate our online events to the next level!

Here is an example of what i mean - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n1J6RE90LvQ

Skills needed:
- Proficiency in OBS and ZOOM
- Experience with creating visual effects
- Strong attention to detail
- Creative thinking and problem-solving skills

item.title: Video editor wanted - Upwork
item.description:
Hello.

I’ve just come back from Dubai with my girlfriend and have about 100 pictures I want to make into a slideshow. I have about 100 picture and 2 videos.

Could someone add all of these to a video, add some music, make it a bit romantic….
